  children={"Subscribe to a task"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/2.0/project/task/{taskid:[0-9]+}/subscribe"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Subscribes to the notifications about the actions performed with the selected task.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"taskid":{"description":"Task ID","type":"integer"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
